original_text: When I was a child, I talked like a child. My thoughts were a child's thoughts. I understood things in a way that a child understands. But now that I have become a man, I have stopped being like a child.
korean_text: 내가 어렸을 때에는 말하는 것이 어린 아이와 같고 깨닫는 것이 어린 아이와 같고 생각하는 것이 어린 아이와 같다가 장성한 사람이 되어서는 어린 아이의 일을 버렸노라

sentences.original_text: My thoughts were a child's thoughts
I understood things in a way that a child understands
But now that I have become a man
I have stopped being like a child
